meanings.definition: The state or quality of being slippery.
meanings.sent1: The slipperiness of the ice made walking very dangerous.
meanings.sent2: Be careful of the slipperiness of the wet floor.
meanings.sent3: The slipperiness of the banana peel caused a hilarious fall.
meanings.sent4: The slipperiness of the situation made it hard to find a solution.
meanings.sent5: The slipperiness of the soap made it fly out of my hands.

meanings.definition: The tendency to slip or slide easily.
meanings.sent1: The slipperiness of the mud caused many falls.
meanings.sent2: The slipperiness of the oil on the road led to accidents.
meanings.sent3: The slipperiness of the situation made it hard to keep a grip.
meanings.sent4: The slipperiness of the slope made it a thrilling ride.
meanings.sent5: The slipperiness of the ice made skating effortless.

meanings.definition: The quality of being smooth and difficult to hold onto.
meanings.sent1: The slipperiness of the glass made it hard to grasp.
meanings.sent2: The slipperiness of the marble floor made walking tricky.
meanings.sent3: The slipperiness of the phone caused it to slip from my hand.
meanings.sent4: The slipperiness of the silk fabric made it slide off the table.
meanings.sent5: The slipperiness of the metal surface made it challenging to hold onto.
